name: Facility Manager reviews TimeMachine advice
title: Facility Manager reviews TimeMachine advice

testSteps.description: Given Felicity has opened their portal

children.description:
Felicity takes notes:
- current_advice: "HI CHRIS, ZONE 1 TEMPERATURES ARE WELL BELOW SLA BOUNDARIES AND THE IT LOAD FOR THIS ZONE IS PREDICTED TO DECLINE OVER THE COMING HOURS. ADJUSTING THE SAT SET POINT IS EXPECTED TO DELIVER SAVINGS. CLICK TO ACCEPT THE RECOMMENDATION OR “SEE OUR LOGIC” FOR A MORE DETAILED ANALYSIS"

testSteps.description:
Then Felicity sees that the advice includes:
| Clause         | Expectation                                   |
| Salutation     | Hi Chris                                      |
| Status         | Zone 1 temperatures are well below SLA        |
| Prediction     | IT Load for this zone is predicted to decline |
| Recommendation | Adjusting the SAT set point                   |
| Objective      | Savings                                       |
| Action         | Click to Accept                               |
| Further        | For more detailed analysis                    |

children.description: Felicity checks that the advice covers all salient points

Felicity iterates over [ {"Clause":"Salutation","Expectation":"Hi Chris"}, {"Clause":"Status","Expectation":"Zone 1 temperatures are well below SLA"}, {"Clause":"Prediction","Expectation":"IT Load for this zone is predicted to decline"}, {"Clause":"Recommendation","Expectation":"Adjusting the SAT set point"}, {"Clause":"Objective","Expectation":"Savings"}, {"Clause":"Action","Expectation":"Click to Accept"}, {"Clause":"Further","Expectation":"For more detailed analysis"} ]

exception.message:
Expected a note of current_advice to include "FOR MORE DETAILED ANALYSIS"

Expectation: includes('FOR MORE DETAILED ANALYSIS')

Expected string: FOR MORE DETAILED ANALYSIS
Received string: HI CHRIS, ZONE 1 TEMPERATURES ARE WELL BELOW SLA BOUNDARIES AND THE IT LOAD FOR THIS ZONE IS PREDICTED TO DECLINE OVER THE COMING HOURS. ADJUSTING THE SAT SET POINT IS EXPECTED TO DELIVER SAVINGS. CLICK TO ACCEPT THE RECOMMENDATION OR “SEE OUR LOGIC” FOR A MORE DETAILED ANALYSIS

    at /home/runner/work/OPtest/OPtest/node_modules/@serenity-js/core/src/screenplay/abilities/PerformActivities.ts:60:13

userStory.narrative:
Octaipipe provides advice to Facility Managers to help them with site Management
The advice should read as natural language, summarizing the site evaluation
The advice includes some elements of:
- Site status
- Short term predictions
- Recommended actions
- Incentives
The FM can accept the advice or view more detailed analysis

actors.name: Felicity
can: ScheduleWork { scheduler: { clock: { timeAdjustment: { milliseconds: 0 } }, interactionTimeout: { milliseconds: 5000 } } }
CallAnApi { baseURL: "http://localhost:3000/", headers: { common: { Accept: "application/json, text/plain, */*" } }, timeout: 10000 }

TakeNotes { notepad: { current_advice: "HI CHRIS, ZONE 1 TEMPERATURES ARE WELL BELOW SLA BOUNDARIES AND THE IT LOAD FOR THIS ZONE IS PREDICTED TO DECLINE OVER THE COMING HOURS. ADJUSTING THE SAT SET POINT IS EXPECTED TO DELIVER SAVINGS. CLICK TO ACCEPT THE RECOMMENDATION OR “SEE OUR LOGIC” FOR A MORE DETAILED ANALYSIS" } }
